3.description: Cypher Bronze effect: Gain Intel by losing combat, increased for loss streaks. Gain a small amount for killing enemies. You may trade your Intel for loot one time on round{CashoutStage1}-{CashoutRound1}, {CashoutStage2}-{CashoutRound2}, {CashoutStage3}-{CashoutRound3}, {CashoutStage4}-{CashoutRound4}, or {CashoutStage5}-{CashoutRound5}.After trading Intel, Cypher champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.({MinUnits}) {ValueMultiplier}x Intel, {AttackDamage}% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%

3.description: Nitro Bronze effect: Every round, unique Nitro champions grant Chrome to R-080T, based on their star level. Each Chrome grants {HealthPerScrap} Health and {APPerScrap} Ability Power. At {FourStarScrapThreshold} Chrome, it upgrades to T-43X! ({MinUnits}) Summon R-080T!({MinUnits}) Fire a giant laser!Chrome per star: {ScrapPerOneStar}/{ScrapPerTwoStar}/{ScrapPerThreeStar}/{ScrapPerFourStar}

1.description: After {Rounds} player combats, open an Armory of Trait Mods that permanently reprogram a champion to benefit from a trait (but not contribute).Every time you get a Trait Mod, the next one requires {RoundIncrement} additional round.Rounds remaining: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_RoundsRemaining@Champions can only have one Trait Mod.Equipped Mods:@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait1@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ1@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait2@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ2@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait3@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ3@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait4@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ4@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait5@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ5@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait6@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ6@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait7@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ7@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait8@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ8@@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait9@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ9@

The Overlord takes a bite out of the unit in the hex behind him, dealing {HPPercentDamage}% of their max Health as true damage. He gains {PercentHPGain}% of their Health and {PercentADGain}% of their Attack Damage.

Gain a hologram copy of the highest cost enemy Viego helped kill last round. It has {Level1Health}/{Level2Health}/{Level3Health} Health, deals {Level1Damage}%/{Level2Damage}%/{Level3Damage}% damage, and has {ItemCount} recommended item.

The Virus infects your shop with a {ChanceToSee}% chance to spawn a bloblet. When purchased, it merges and increases the strongest Zac's max Health by {BonusPercentHPPerStack}% and Ability Power by {BonusAPPerStack} (doubled in Hyper Roll). (Total Bloblets: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Virus_Stacks@)

2.description: Executioner Bronze effect: Executioner Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.If the target's Health is below {HealthThreshold}%, the bonus Critical Strike Damage is doubled.({MinUnits}) {CRIT_PERCENT}% %i:scaleCrit%, {CRIT_DAMAGE}% %i:scaleCritMult%({MinUnits}) {CRIT_PERCENT}% %i:scaleCrit%, {CRIT_DAMAGE}% %i:scaleCritMult%({MinUnits}) {CRIT_PERCENT}% %i:scaleCrit%, {CRIT_DAMAGE}% %i:scaleCritMult%({MinUnits}) {CRIT_PERCENT}% %i:scaleCrit%, {CRIT_DAMAGE}% %i:scaleCritMult%; also gain {DamageReduction}% Durability
